fields.description: The access key identifier of the Amazon S3 Compatible Identity and Access Management (IAM) user. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: AccessKeyId

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: If true, use S3 path-style access instead of virtual hosted-style access. Default value is false. Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: ForcePathStyle

fields.description: This value specifies the endpoint to access with the Amazon S3 Compatible Connector. This is an optional property; change it only if you want to try a different service endpoint or want to switch between https and http. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServiceUrl
